name: dog_dash
description: Dog Dash - A 3D world exploration game.

scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && npm run copy:wasm && vite build
scripts.copy:wasm: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); fs.mkdirSync('public/build', { recursive: true }); ['optimized.wasm','optimized.wasm.map'].forEach(f => { const src = 'build/' + f; const dest = 'public/build/' + f; if (fs.existsSync(src)) fs.copyFileSync(src, dest); });"
scripts.predev: npm run build:wasm && npm run copy:wasm
